def process_message(user_text, sentiment_score, timestamp):
    global mode

    # Check for inactivity: if user pauses too long, send a nudge
    if time_since_last_user_msg(timestamp) > TIMEOUT[mode]:
        send_message(RESPONSES[mode][-1])  # gentle check‑in

        return

        escalate(mode)
        return

    # Default: normal supportive reply
    send_message(random.choice(RESPONSES[mode]))


def escalate(current_mode):
    """Move up or down depending on intensity and safety confirmation."""
    next_mode = NEXT_MODE[current_mode]

    if current_mode == "full_crisis" and not user_confirmed_safe():

        send_message(random.choice(RESPONSES["full_crisis"]))
    else:
        mode = next_mode
        send_message(random.choice(RESPONSES[mode]))
